img_above_text:
![Wukong Brook 9.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/c0/Wukong_Brook_9.jpg)
Once you reach an apparent cliff edge, beware of a Frozen Corpse hiding in an overturned bell, and check the inside to find a green Wisp to absorb.
img_below_text:
In fact, this cliff edge hides a secret, and you can carefully descend to find a secret cave that's devoid of opponents for now, but you can at least activate the Melon Field Shrine for now.
![Wukong Brook 10.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e9/Wukong_Brook_10.jpg)

content.text:
You are given an image and related metadata and context.

            Image Position:
            - This is 50 from the file 'Valley_of_Ecstasy_Walkthrough.md'.

            Context:
            - Preceding Text: "![Wukong Brook 9.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/c/c0/Wukong_Brook_9.jpg)
Once you reach an apparent cliff edge, beware of a Frozen Corpse hiding in an overturned bell, and check the inside to find a green Wisp to absorb."
            - Following Text: "In fact, this cliff edge hides a secret, and you can carefully descend to find a secret cave that's devoid of opponents for now, but you can at least activate the Melon Field Shrine for now.
![Wukong Brook 10.jpg](https://oyster.ignimgs.com/mediawiki/apis.ign.com/black-myth-wukong/e/e9/Wukong_Brook_10.jpg)"

            Your task:
            1. Generate a **short, clear, and informative English summary** of the image.
            2. Focus primarily on the **preceding and following text** to infer the image's **purpose, content, or narrative role**.

img_summary: The image depicts a character from the game "Black Myth: Wukong" standing on a snowy cliff edge. The preceding text warns of a Frozen Corpse hiding in an overturned bell nearby and suggests checking inside the bell for a green Wisp. The following text reveals that the cliff edge hides a secret, and players can carefully descend to find a secret cave where they can activate the Melon Field Shrine. The image serves to illustrate the precarious cliff edge and the beginning of the descent to the hidden cave.
